note: The design incorporates Chettinad architectural elements such as ornate arches and traditional motifs. Floor-to-ceiling windows are used strategically for ample natural light while adhering to privacy needs. The layout respects Vastu principles by ensuring proper placement of openings, particularly the west-facing elements for the living room and the master bedroom on the north side.
